strapiPost.title: Crystal Bridges Gala Draws Celebrities And Fashion Icons To Bentonville
strapiPost.photoCredit: Crystal Bridges Museum of American Art
strapiPost.content:
Crystal Bridges welcomed celebrities and fashion legends to Bentonville last week during the Grit to Glamour gala, part of the museum's first-ever fashion exhibition. 

  • Best in the biz: A fashion symposium was held before the gala featuring conversations with fashion icons like Tommy Hilfiger, Tracy Reese, Aurora James, Bethann Hardison, and more. 
  • Sparkling debate: Other celebrities attended like Norman Lear, Seth Meyers, and Karlie Kloss, whose Instagram post of her very sparkly dress sparkled so hard it sparked the age-old debate of whether NWA is in the South or the Midwest. 

Learn more about the Fashioning America: Grit to Glamour exhibition HERE.
